<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything2" site="http://everything2.com" servertime="Wed Nov 19 03:45:11 2014">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="Bitriot" node_id="2117032" parent_e2node="1063588" author_user="Auspice">On the carpet of leaves illuminated by the moon</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="lizardinlaw" node_id="2117033" parent_e2node="2117035" author_user="ALittleHawk">La Kalima</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2116679" parent_e2node="2116678" author_user="etouffee">Below this table our knees touched. Twice.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2107044" parent_e2node="2045865" author_user="haqiqat">war trophies for people who have never been to war</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2116017" parent_e2node="1397008" author_user="mauler">1620</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="ALittleHawk" node_id="2054123" parent_e2node="1807864" author_user="worn-out_shoe">Her hips made waves against his shore</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="430707" parent_e2node="430706" author_user="ModernAngel">Amos 4</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="mauler" node_id="1806004" parent_e2node="1806003" author_user="anyend">Beondegi</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2117015" parent_e2node="2116999" author_user="borgo">November 18, 2014</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="ALittleHawk" node_id="2116805" parent_e2node="2116806" author_user="lizardinlaw">Painting Angels</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Ashigaru" node_id="2051709" parent_e2node="1967798" author_user="Orange Julius">The Kindness of Obama</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Bitriot" node_id="2117026" parent_e2node="61927" author_user="avalyn">bass guitar</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="mullakamakalaka" node_id="841904" parent_e2node="841898" author_user="Roninspoon">The inadequacies of Arby's crew members</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="iceowl" node_id="2116907" parent_e2node="1812106" author_user="haqiqat">I give blood because I've got it on my hands.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="DonJaime" node_id="2110152" parent_e2node="922138" author_user="Bitriot">Sandblasting</cooled>
</COOLEDNODES>
